thread.title: Outrage as ‘homeless’ gang pose as beggars to pocket YOUR cash before leaving in a CAR
thread.title_full: Outrage as ‘homeless’ gang pose as beggars to pocket YOUR cash before leaving in a CAR

title: Outrage as ‘homeless’ gang pose as beggars to pocket YOUR cash before leaving in a CAR
text:
SHOCK: The three beggars drove into Cambridge in a car with Romanian number plates “They bark at the kids – it’s easy prey to them” Lisa Jay 
The three beggars drove into Cambridge in a Volkswagen Passat with Romanian number plates on Saturday morning. 
After paying to park for eight hours, the trio walked a mile to separate spots to beg for money in the city centre. 
On being confronted, one apparent beggar with a child's crutch claimed not to speak English. 
KELVIN MEDIA SHAM: The group arrive in Cambridge in a Romanian registered car 
British Red Cross volunteer Lisa Jay said the man with the crutch had become "confrontational and spoke in English" after she told him she had no change. 
She told the Daily Mail: "They look to target the students who have some spare change and don’t want the hassle of turning them down. They bark at the kids – it’s easy prey to them." 
KELVIN MEDIA TRICKED: Each gang member asked passersby for cash across the city 
Cambridge police have previously released figures saying four of every nine people arrested for begging are not actually homeless. 
Resident Asthma Begum, 34, said: "I had never thought that they were homeless, as I had seen them get out of the car and wait around before walking off. 
"It’s not like there’s any bus routes on the road to wait for. If you had a child’s crutch I do not see how you could walk that far into town." 
KELVIN MEDIA WRONG WAY: One gang member exits the car before hitting Cambridge city centre Mario Balotelli gets homeless man to take photos of him ahead of Liverpool exit Tuesday, 30th August 2016 MARIO BALOTELLI got a homeless man to take photos of him on his mobile phone yesterday as the Liverpool flop appeared to enjoy a goodbye meal with friends. 1 / 16 Mario Balotelli spotted in Manchester city centre Related videos
